pull.title: Pow: Introduce MaybeGenerateProof
pull.body:
This simplifies generateBlocks and further encapsulates the use of nNonce and nBits inside pow.o by introducing a new function MaybeGenerateProof.

This should be helpful for any attempt to support a testnet with signed blocks (see #9177 )

events.body: Closing for now due to inactivity. We can reopen, when there is more appetite.

comments.body: It seems unnecessary to call `CheckProofOfWork` twice. You can move it from the while loop into the body, and make it return true immediately when it succeeds.
